verses.verse: Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>: for he hath torn <WH2963> <WH8804>, and he will heal <WH7495> <WH8799> us; he hath smitten <WH5221> <WH8686>, and he will bind us up <WH2280> <WH8799>.
After two days <WH3117> will he revive <WH2421> <WH8762> us: in the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> he will raise us up <WH6965> <WH8686>, and we shall live <WH2421> <WH8799> in his sight <WH6440>.

Then shall we know <WH3045> <WH8799>, if we follow <WH7291> <WH8799> on to know <WH3045> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068>: his going forth <WH4161> is prepared <WH3559> <WH8737> as the morning <WH7837>; and he shall come <WH935> <WH8799> unto us as the rain <WH1653>, as the latter <WH4456> and former rain <WH3384> <WH8802> unto the earth <WH776>.

O Efrayim <WH669>, what shall I do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto thee? O Y'hudah <WH3063>, what shall I do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto thee? for your goodness <WH2617> is as a morning <WH1242> cloud <WH6051>, and as the early <WH7925> <WH8688> dew <WH2919> it goeth away <WH1980> <WH8802>.

Therefore have I hewed <WH2672> <WH8804> them by the prophets <WH5030>; I have slain <WH2026> <WH8804> them by the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>: and thy judgments <WH4941> are as the light <WH216> that goeth forth <WH3318> <WH8799>.
For I desired <WH2654> <WH8804> mercy <WH2617>, and not sacrifice <WH2077>; and the knowledge <WH1847> of 'Elohim <WH430> more than burnt offerings <WH5930>.
But they like men <WH120> have transgressed <WH5674> <WH8804> the covenant <WH1285>: there have they dealt treacherously <WH898> <WH8804> against me.
Gil`ad <WH1568> is a city <WH7151> of them that work <WH6466> <WH8802> iniquity <WH205>, and is polluted <WH6121> with blood <WH1818>.

And as troops <WH1416> of robbers wait <WH2442> <WH8763> for a man <WH376>, so the company <WH2267> of Kohanim <WH3548> murder <WH7523> <WH8762> in the way <WH1870> by consent <WH7926> <WH8677> <WH7927>: for they commit <WH6213> <WH8804> lewdness <WH2154>.
I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> an horrible thing <WH8186> in the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: there is the whoredom <WH2184> of Efrayim <WH669>, Yisra'EL <WH3478> is defiled <WH2930> <WH8738>.
Also, O Y'hudah <WH3063>, he hath set <WH7896> <WH8804> an harvest <WH7105> for thee, when I returned <WH7725> <WH8800> the captivity <WH7622> of my people <WH5971>.
